1.name: The Lion King
1.description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

2.name: The Shawshank Redemption
2.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

3.name: Pulp Fiction
3.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

4.name: Forrest Gump
4.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

5.name: Léon: The Professional
5.description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

6.name: Legends of the Fall
6.description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

7.name: The Mask
7.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

8.name: Natural Born Killers
8.description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

9.name: Stargate
9.description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

10.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
10.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

11.name: The Crow
11.description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

12.name: True Lies
12.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

13.name: The Little Rascals
13.description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

14.name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
14.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

15.name: Dumb and Dumber
15.description: The cross-country adventures of 2 good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

16.name: Speed
16.description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

17.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
17.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

18.name: Quiz Show
18.description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

19.name: Chungking Express
19.description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

20.name: Street Fighter
20.description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

21.name: Ed Wood
21.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

22.name: In the Mouth of Madness
22.description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

23.name: Clerks
23.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

24.name: Color of Night
24.description: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

25.name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
25.description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

26.name: Little Women
26.description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

27.name: The Jungle Book
27.description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wolves, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

28.name: The Client
28.description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

29.name: Wyatt Earp
29.description: The story of Wyatt Earp as he interacts and battles other famous figures of the Wild West era.

30.name: The Next Karate Kid
30.description: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.

31.name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
31.description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

32.name: Frankenstein
32.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

33.name: Little Giants
33.description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

34.name: Clear and Present Danger
34.description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

35.name: My Father the Hero
35.description: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

36.name: Angels in the Outfield
36.description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

37.name: Three Colors: Red
37.description: A model discovers her neighbor is keen on invading people's privacy.

38.name: Star Trek: Generations
38.description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

39.name: The Flintstones
39.description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

40.name: New Nightmare
40.description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

41.name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
41.description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

42.name: Reality Bites
42.description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

43.name: Serial Mom
43.description: A sweet mother finds herself participating in homicidal activities when she sees the occasion call for it.

44.name: Major League II
44.description: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

45.name: Only You
45.description: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

46.name: Heavenly Creatures
46.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

47.name: Once Were Warriors
47.description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

48.name: The Hudsucker Proxy
48.description: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

49.name: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
49.description: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

50.name: Muriel's Wedding
50.description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.
